meanings.definition: Coming from an external source or occurring accidentally
meanings.sent1: The adventitias noise of the thunder startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected rain was an adventitias event during the dry season.
meanings.sent3: The adventitias arrival of the clown at the funeral brought a moment of levity.
meanings.sent4: Her adventitias talent for painting blossomed overnight.
meanings.sent5: The adventitias aroma of freshly baked bread filled the room.

meanings.sent1: The adventitias decorations added a festive touch to the party.
meanings.sent2: His adventitias knowledge of French helped him during the trip.
meanings.sent3: The adventitias color of the car made it stand out in the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: Her adventitias charm won over the skeptical crowd.
meanings.sent5: The adventitias sound of laughter echoed through the room.
